wikitext.*:
'''Cape Andras''' was a long cape stretching south and west of the city of [[Brithombar]] and forming a small bay shielding the city.<ref>{{WJ|Beleriand}}, ''Sheet 3 South-west'', p. 184</ref>

The Cape Andras marked the northwestern limit of the region of [[Eglamar (Falas)|Eglamar]].<ref>{{WJ|B}}, ''Sindarin'', pp. 379-80</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Andras'' is in [[Sindarin]], meaning "Long Cape". It is composed of the elements ''[[and]]'' ("long") + ''[[ras(t)]]'' ("cape").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-121165383.html|articlename=S. ''Andras'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=24 November 2023}}</ref>

== See also ==
*[[Andrast]], a cape in [[Gondor]]
